text.p: Cherokee - (built 1996) 165,000 dwt del China end July trip via W.Australia redel China $15,400 daily NSS.
Lowlands Grace - - (built 1991) 149,000 dwt del Japan mid August 12 months trading $16,000 daily Klaveness.
Leopardi - - (built 1982) 132,000 dwt del Continent mid August four to six months trading $11,650 daily Cobam (reported).
Global Harmony - (built 1997) 73,500 dwt del Cigading prompt trip via Port Hedland redel Bin Qasim $11,000 daily Pan Ocean.
Jasper - (built 1996) 74,012 dwt 14 on 30 del Taichung end July four to six months trading $10,400 daily Showa.
Nordmax - (built 1995) 72,500 dwt 14 on 33 del USG early Aug trip Far East $13,400 daily plus $240,000 bb Halla.
Torm Marta - (built 1997) 69,638 dwt del Philippines prompt trip Continent $7,750 daily CNR.
Dimitris Perottis - (built 1984) 64,933 dwt 13 on 29.5 plus 1.8 del Japan prompt trip via Nopac redel Bin Qasim $9,500 daily Associated Shipping.
Daphne - (built 1984) 64,873 dwt 14 on 34 del passing Muscat ooutbound 20/25 July trip via ECSA redel Far East $10,200 daily Halla (reported).
Irenes Vigour ex-Oakby - (built 1983) 64,197 dwt 13.5 on 32 plus 2.5 del S.Korea prompt three to five months trading $9,500 daily Bulktrans.
Edco Star - (built 1982) 64,060 dwt 14 on 36 plus 0.5 del Bin Qasim 25/30 July trip via India redel China $9,250 daily Noble.
Heliopolis - (built 1977) 64,464 dwt 13 on 32 plus 2.5 del Nopac 20/30 July trip Mideast Gulf $8,250 daily plus $160,000 bb Andre.
Metallica - (built 1982) 61,883 dwt 14 on 39 plus 2 del Nopac end July trip Japan $8,600 daily plus $160,000 bb Halla.
Hanjin Victoria - (built 1982) 61,502 dwt 14 on 38 plus 2.2 del Inchon 16/20 July trip via Nopac redel Bin Qasim $8,850 daily Associated Shipping.
Cargo Enterprise - (built 1978) 44,600 dwt del South Africa prompt redel Far East $8,750 daily plus $140,000 bb M and R.
TBN - 30,000 dwt del Japan prompt Nopac r/v $7,500 daily Tokai.
Olympic Mentor - (built 1984) 29,693 dwt 13 on 18 plus 1.5 del Malaysia prompt trip via Australia redel Far East approx. $7,700 daily Pacrim.
